divs: Sighting DetailsI just saw this big perfect triangle in the sky, I used my binoculars and saw each light corner like a police car with blue, red and yellow colors. I took my camera and shot some pictures between 8:15 and 8:44PM I used a manual option with f4:20sec. I see the pictures with one color in each corner but was not the same when I used my binoculars. It was more flashy in colors, .... I think 20sec exposure time mixed the real colors. I have 11 pictures (high resolution) and I'll try to upload them. Let me know if this is a real UFO event or are known stars that happens to be in that formation at that time SW from my home. Thank you Denny Mansilla Pd the site doesn't allow me to upload the pictures, Please reply with instructions
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Hercules
There were no other sightings in Hercules on or around August 6th 2012
Summary: A big triangle far distance, each point of the triangle had a flashing distinctive color and luminance es
